page.title: 16GAMES BETHAN AND PIPPA PLAY
page.content: We play lots of games together, these two are our favourites.{Block 123}is a good game you need between four and ten people. All you have to do is hide and the person who is on counts up to one hundred or two hundred. When they have counted up to it they say "I'm coming"-so they all keep still. When they have been found, one should say "block 123" and the name of the person you see.Another game is called{ {My Red Letter}its a game you can play at home and at school.One person says a letter and if the other people have got it in their christian or surname they move foward a step. If they said a red letter and they moved and the letter was not in their name they would have to go back to the start. The object of the game is to try to reach the person calling out the "red" letters.
